cause.description:
Hey guys, there is now an official LiNK Cause created by HQ. I'm trying to get this one deleted so that all our efforts can be focused in one "Cause". The official Cause is linked below... 7 times... you can't miss it.
http://apps.facebook.com/causes/view_cause/570
1. http://apps.facebook.com/causes/view_cause/570

4. http://apps.facebook.com/causes/view_cause/570
5. http://apps.facebook.com/causes/view_cause/570
6. http://apps.facebook.com/causes/view_cause/570
cause.mission: Please read the description before joining or donating!
cause.name: Liberty in North Korea
